name: Nurture or Neglect?
description:
“Nurture or Neglect?” places you in the role of GOD as you take to looking after or destroying GLOBS – cute little round blue beings whose role in life is only to blink (and to reproduce, of course).

You cannot directly manipulate Globs, but you can shift the green-coloured earth that they walk upon.

Music by Gavin Koh @ https://soundcloud.com/gavinkoh/the-emptiness-of-the-void-piano-solo
Some artwork by Vicki Wenderlich @ gameartguppy.com

Gameplay Instructions:

The objective of the game is to use your mouse to drag the green tiles and to drop them so that your Globs can meet somewhere in their small confined game world of Globbledygook.

Placing a green tile atop another gives you a food coin, while placing another green tile atop the food coin gives you a useful ladder. Coins can be moved, but ladders cannot.

“Nurture or Neglect?” comes with two simple game modes: Nurture asks that you grow a colony of 200 globs and Neglect asks that you destroy a colony of 200 globs.

Note: There is a zoom-in button at the top right corner of the UI. Use the cursor keys to navigate and click on the same icon to zoom-out.
